attributes.action: let market demand, not minority superstition, determine when shops can open.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Get rid of the Sunday trading laws now. This is the 21st century and people want to shop on a Sunday. Why should the beliefs of a minority prevent shops from opening normal hours. The benefits to our economy would be vast.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
